spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Smite and Penance increase the damage of your next Mind Blast by 25% or absorb amount of your next Power Word: Shield by 15%, up to 3 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grasp of the Furnace Seraph

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 191 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shroud of the Furnace Seraph

spells.description:
Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
